output.sentences: The watched the family play together at the park, it's nice to see mom and dad both partaking in family fun.
I noticed the dad take a break to start up the grill and begin cooking their barbecue food.
The children continued to play with paddles and balls.
When the dinner was ready to eat, the children decided to join the mom and dad at the wheel shaped table.
After they enjoyed their dinner the children helped clean off the wheel shaped table and the mom and dad joined the children in the park for some more family fun.
